reviews.review: just amazing. comedy, pacing, action was just great. top 5 mcu movie for sure
Extremely disappointed, The storyline was confusing, The end was terrible. Would not recommend to anyone
Lots of great action and every fight had a meaning to it. That ending thought whew!
Not what I expected. Absolutely worth watching.

¿Tan mal planeada puede estar una pelicula que se penso desde hace 10 años?  Demasiada atencion a los chistes y poco espiritu en vincularlos a una trama, una necesidad gastada de pisar las lineas de un personaje con otro y ningun compromiso con el desarrollo de cada historia personal, demasiado contrato y pelea por la mejor aparicion con el cabello ondeando en el viento, pero en todo esto no hay una trama que justifique tantos años de superheroes, y no hay superheroes que justifiquen cinco peliculas de ciudades destruidas. Esta muy bien ser pretencioso, pero que rabia dan los pretenciosos que hacen la plancha.
Perfect balance of humor and darkness. Absolutely loved it from start to finish.

I had a few nitpicks, but overall it was an incredible movie with witty dialogue, fleshed out characters, and actual emotional moments unlike most marvel movies where it leaves you cold inside(The exceptions being Guardians of the Galaxy Vol.2 and Spiderman: Homecoming)
Amazing movie but the end is terrible.

This is more for those professional reviewers..... Does anyone TRULY ever agree with them?.... And if not, why do they even have jobs? 
For the naysayers of this movie, we just have to agree to disagree. This movie had everything and then some that I have come to love in a Marvel movie. Big action, comedy, epic fight sequences and amazing CGI. These heroes are all loveable in their own way. To anyone that hasn't watched all of the priors, please do or you will be very confused about things that are mentioned in this movie. Yes, huge marketing ploy, but that's how these things work. I, for one, LOVE this movie shocking ending and all. I will eagerly await the next one. Good job at keeping me hooked, Marvel!
